writer.name: 罗德里克·麦凯 Roderick MacKay

introduction: Shot on a Canon 7D and 5DmkIICompleted early 2010 in Perth, Western Australia.Making this short film was a total blast. The budget was tiny, but the dedication and enthusiasm across all facets of cast and crew was truly overwhelming, not to mention the vast in-kind support from family, friends, unfathomably patient extras, and the broader Perth filmmaking community. The production of TRIGGER would not have been possible without you all - thank you.Official Website - triggershortfilm.comBecome a fan - facebook.com/pages/TRIGGER/108932735801164Watch the 'MAKING TRIGGER' behind the scenes featurette - vimeo.com/33707719
